document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R18-002
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R18-002
Authorizing a Contract Extension with Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, for Investment Fund Protection
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 13th day of February, 2018, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and
the Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement; and
the Pueblo maintains investment accounts with investment firms with such accounts containing significant funds for future needs of the Pueblo and to provide security for unforeseen circumstances; and
the investment firms make important decisions regarding the management of the Pueblo's investment accounts and involving complicated securities transactions in a highly regulated environment; and

the Council has identified the need to provide additional protections and monitoring of the Pueblo's investment accounts through regular, professional monitoring of the transactions involving the Pueblo's funds; and
the Pueblo currently has a contract with Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, to assist in protection and monitoring of the investment accounts, with such contract term expiring in February 2018; and
the Pueblo has determined the need to extend this contract for an additional 3 year period.
NOW THEREFOR BE IT RESOLVED, that the Council hereby enacts the attached law entitled "AUTHORIZING A CONTRACT EXTENSION WITH PORTFOLIO
MONITORING, LLC, FOR INVESTMENT FUND PROTECTION."

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as, "AUTHORIZING A CONTRACT EXTENSION WITH PORTFOLIO MONITORING, LLC, FOR INVESTMENT FUND PROTECTION."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of the Act is to provide the Pueblo with additional protection for the Pueblo's investment accounting by authorizing the Governor to extend the current contract with a highly qualified professional company, Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, to provide ongoing monitoring services of the Pueblo's investment accounts, and to report the findings directly to the Governor and Council.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: The Council hereby finds and declares that:

para.text: The Pueblo maintains investment accounts with investment advisors containing significant funds for the future needs of the Pueblo and to provide security for unforeseen circumstances; and
The investment advisors make important decisions regarding the management of the Pueblo's investment accounts and involving complicated securities transactions in a highly regulated environment; and

The Council has identified the need to continue to provide additional protections and monitoring of the Pueblo's investment accounts through regular, professional monitoring of the transactions involving the Pueblo's funds; and

The Council and Executive Branch officials have identified a highly qualified portfolio monitoring company, Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, that provides specialized and cost-effective services to protect the Pueblo's sizeable accounts maintained at the investment firms; and

The Council has determined that the use of a fraction of the investment funds to provide additional protection to the Pueblo's sizeable investment fund is cost-effective and fulfills its fiduciary duty owed to the members of the Pueblo.

The Council hereby authorizes the Pueblo to implement a 3 year contract extension to continue services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, to provide professional monitoring services of the Pueblo's investment accounts, and to report their written findings to the Pueblo.; and

The Council hereby authorizes the Governor to negotiate and execute a contract extension with Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, in substantially the same form as proposed and on a sole-source basis due to their highly specialized securities monitoring services and extensive experience; and
The Council hereby authorizes the Governor to utilize funds from the investment accounts to obtain the portfolio monitoring services as an expense of maintaining the investment accounts; and
Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, shall provide written reports on a least a quarterly basis of their findings and services directly to the Governor and Council.
